    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AddItemView
    Represents the seller GUI for adding new products
    Bundle
    Represents a collection of products bundled together and sold as a single unit.
    BundleItemsView
    Represents the seller GUI for bundling items.
    BuyItemView
    GUI class for the view presented to customers when they wish to add items to the cart.
    CheckoutController
    Handles the checkout process for a customer including generating an invoice, processing payment, and saving an order.
    CheckoutView
    Represents the checkout gui that shows when the customer is ready to check out.
    Command
    Interface for the Command design pattern used in the SellerDashboardView's toolbar.
    CreateAccountView
    Represents the window taking in information for account creation.
    Customer
    Represents a customer in the system.
    CustomerDashboardView
    Represents the main GUI on the customer-side of the application.
    DiscountDecorator
    An abstract class that serves as a decorator for applying discounts onto ProductComponent objects.
    DiscountView
    Represents the Discount product GUI for sellers.
    EditItemView
    Represents the seller GUI for editing items in their inventory.
    FlatDiscount
    Applies a flat discount to the price of a product.
    Inventory
    Represents the inventory of products managed by the system.
    InventoryController
    Handles interactions with the product inventory such as adding and removing products, viewing products, and searching for products.
    LoginController
    Handles the core logic for logging in, logging out, and creating new accounts.
    LoginView
    Represents the loginView screen where users log into the system.
    Main
     
    Observer
    Observer interface to facilitate inventory notifications in the system.
    Order
    Represents a Customer's order.
    OrderHistoryView
    Represents the GUI popup for the order history.
    PaymentWindow
    Represents the GUI shown to the customer when payment details must be provided.
    PercentageDiscount
    Applies a percentage discount to the price of the product.
    Product
    Represents a product with attributes like name, type, description, prices and quantity.
    ProductComponent
    Interface for storing information regarding products, bundles, and discounts.
    Seller
    Represents a Seller in the system.
    SellerAddProductCommand
    Concrete command class used for opening the add product menu.
    SellerBundleItemsCommand
    Concrete command class used for opening the bundle items menu.
    SellerDashboardView
    Represents the main GUI for the Seller side of the application.
    SellerFinancialsView
     
    SellerLogoutCommand
    Concrete command class used for logging the seller out.
    Session
    Stores the current user.
    ShoppingCart
    Represents a shopping cart that holds products.
    ShoppingCartController
    Controller class for facilitating user interaction and updating the display of the shopping cart.
    ShoppingCartView
    View class for displaying the shopping cart and its contents.
    Subject
    Subject interface for publishers like the Inventory
    User
    Abstract class for storing User information in the system.
    UserSystem
    The UserSystem stores all users registered.
